entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -15.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 11:46 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -15.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 54 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -22.6°C
Wind: W 28 km/h gust 37 km/h

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 12 February 2023
